summary: A solar power system seller appeals a Taxpayer Information and Education section letter ruling that a special purpose entity does not qualify for the cost recovery incentive payment under RCW 82.16.120 and WAC 458-20-273 (Rule 273), where it leases the roof space of a customer of a light and power company, installs its renewable energy system on the roof and sells the energy produced by the system to the roof owner. We affirm the letter ruling and deny the appeal.
